mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.sumprice as t_sumprice, t.code as t_code, t.name as t_name, t.unit as t_unit, t.amount as t_amount, t.dtgcl as t_dtgcl, t.price as t_price, t.remark as t_remark, t.parentid as t_parentid, t.leaf as t_leaf, t.bit_project_id as t_bit_project_id

mapper.update: update tm_unitproject set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dtgcl = #{dtgcl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leaf = #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bit_project_id = #{bitProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sumprice = #{sumprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
